entry.title: Scaling Bitcoin conference micro-report
entry.summary: In this conversation, NxtChg argues that becoming popular and successful is not enough to resist regulatory capture. He believes that becoming a strong central authority would only make it easier for the government to regulate Bitcoin. Instead, he suggests an alternative approach of staying low profile and utilizing parkour tricks to evade regulation. The author suggests that this lack of creativity in thinking about resistance shows a lack of understanding of what Satoshi created with Bitcoin.
